entities.name: lee jordan
entities.description: Lee Jordan is a person who is finding it difficult not to take sides in the Quidditch match.

entities.name: professor mcgonagall
entities.description: Professor McGonagall is a person who warns Lee Jordan about taking sides.

entities.name: flint
entities.description: Flint is the person who nearly kills the Gryffindor Seeker in the Quidditch match.

entities.name: spinnet
entities.description: Spinnet is a person who takes a penalty for Gryffindor in the Quidditch match.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the person who is playing as the Gryffindor Seeker in the Quidditch match.

entities.name: nimbus two thousands
entities.description: Nimbus Two Thousands is a broom that Harry is riding during the Quidditch match.

relationships.description: Professor McGonagall warns Lee Jordan about taking sides in the Quidditch match.
Flint nearly kills Harry, the Gryffindor Seeker, during the Quidditch match.
Spinnet takes a penalty for Gryffindor in the Quidditch match.
